languages.text: Enemies that are targeted by the wearer's psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) and {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者使用灵能{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响敌人时，所有受到影响的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−15减值。未能通过检定的目标会承受{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（10）与{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: Enemies that are targeted by the wearer's psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) and {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者使用灵能{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响敌人时，所有受到影响的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-15{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的目标会承受{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（10）与{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}效果。

装备者使用灵能{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响敌人时，所有受到影响的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−15{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的目标会承受{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（10）与{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}效果。

languages.text: Противники, ставшие целями псайкерских {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −15 и в случае провала получают эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (10) и {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies that are targeted by the wearer's psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) and {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Противники, ставшие целями псайкерских {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −15 и в случае провала получают эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (10) и ослепление.

Противники, ставшие целями псайкерских {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −15 и в случае провала получают эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (10) и ослепление.

languages.text: 使用者の超能力{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットとなっている敵は、ペナルティ15の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(10)および{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: Enemies that are targeted by the wearer's psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) and {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の超能力{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットとなっている敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}15の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g} (10) と{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。

使用者の超能力{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットとなっている敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}15の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g} (10) と{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。

languages.text: Los enemigos alcanzados por las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} psíquicas del portador deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de −15 o sufrirán {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (10) y el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies that are targeted by the wearer's psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) and {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos alcanzados por las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} psíquicas del portador deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de resistencia de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −15 o sufrirán {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (10) y el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}.

languages.text: Feinde, die von psionischen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Trägers anvisiert werden, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Abzug von −15 bestehen, um nicht mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (10) und {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g} belegt zu werden.
languages.original_text: Enemies that are targeted by the wearer's psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) and {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Feinde, die von psionischen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Trägers anvisiert werden, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-Widerstands{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -15 bestehen oder {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (10) und {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g} erleiden.

languages.text: Les ennemis ciblés par les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} psychiques de l'utilisateur doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une pénalité de −15, faute de quoi ils subissent les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (10) et {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies that are targeted by the wearer's psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) and {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis ciblés par les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} psychiques de l'utilisateur doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -15, faute de quoi ils subissent les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (10) et {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}.

Les ennemis ciblés par les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} psychiques de l'utilisateur doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une pénalité de −15, faute de quoi ils subissent les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (10) et {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişinin ruhsezi {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerinin{/g} hedefi olan düşmanlar, −15 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} (10) ve {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşmeye{/g} maruz kalırlar.
